%%%%%
%% Setup
%%%%%

\acsetup{%
	make-links = true,
	list/heading = none,
	}
	
\AddAcroTranslations{German}{%
	list-name = {Abk√ºrzungsverzeichnis}
	}

%%%%%
%% Cases
%%%%%
\DeclareAcroEnding{genitive}{}{}
\DeclareAcroEnding{dative}{}{}
\DeclareAcroEnding{accusative}{}{}

\NewAcroCommand\acGen{m}{\acrogenitive\UseAcroTemplate{first}{#1}}
\NewAcroCommand\acsGen{m}{\acrogenitive\UseAcroTemplate{short}{#1}}
\NewAcroCommand\aclGen{m}{\acrogenitive\UseAcroTemplate{long}{#1}}
\NewAcroCommand\acfGen{m}{\acrofull\acrogenitive\UseAcroTemplate{first}{#1}}

\NewAcroCommand\acDat{m}{\acrodative\UseAcroTemplate{first}{#1}}
\NewAcroCommand\acsDat{m}{\acrodative\UseAcroTemplate{short}{#1}}
\NewAcroCommand\aclDat{m}{\acrodative\UseAcroTemplate{long}{#1}}
\NewAcroCommand\acfDat{m}{\acrofull\acrodative\UseAcroTemplate{first}{#1}}

\NewAcroCommand\acAcc{m}{\acroaccusative\UseAcroTemplate{first}{#1}}
\NewAcroCommand\acsAcc{m}{\acroaccusative\UseAcroTemplate{short}{#1}}
\NewAcroCommand\aclAcc{m}{\acroaccusative\UseAcroTemplate{long}{#1}}
\NewAcroCommand\acfAcc{m}{\acrofull\acroaccusative\UseAcroTemplate{first}{#1}}
